game.name: OMG Word Pop
game.description:
Do you think that you have good command over English language? This brand new puzzle game is not only for the native English speakers, but it is for everyone who has strong enough vocabulary. Get ready to play with multiple letters and spot different English words in OMG Word Pop game! All you need to do is just click the play button to allow yourself to delve into the amazing realm of words while solving out multiple levels. Tap and drag alphabets to create unique English words like ‘rabbit’, ‘bow’ and ‘mist’!
Your success will depend upon how fast you can form different English worlds. Each alphabet includes multiple letters and your objective is to mix them perfectly in this challenging online arcade challenge. Begin the puzzle fun with one word, then two and more! The complexities in word creation will keep increasing as you progress. Try to keep your eyes on the letters on each one of the boards and piece them together as fast as you can to earn tons of stars!
There 50 unique and challenging levels to play online for free in this cool html5 words game. Have a look at the blanks that you will have to take the words right below the letters! Your every successful attempt will reward you with some points. Check out the status of star bar right at the top of the screen! Avoid making mistakes since your every mistake can reduce the bar! Click the hint button to know the letters to figure out the words! Try out more word games that are free to play online, no download required on atmegame.com!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game OMG Word Pop at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Puzzle games for best excitement and thrill in you!
